Title: Sprite Vortex
Description:
Sprite Vortex aims to greatly reduce the time needed to create frame based sprite animations. It covers common and useful operations such as importing a spritesheet, building spritesheet from separate images , cutting frames, building animations and more.
Developed in: C#.
HomeWiki:
Current Version:

Sprite Vortex 1.4.0 beta














About Project

Sprite Vortex aims to greatly reduce the time needed to create frame based sprite animations. It covers common and useful operations such as importing a spritesheet, building spritesheet from separate images , cutting frames, building animations and more.
Developed in: C#.

Requisites: .NET Framework 2+

Contact

If you have any comments, suggestions, bugs, critics, post it on Discussions page or bugs on Issue Tracker page or just send an email to spritevortex@gmail.com
